issue.title: Add new service : Negociation version
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The Service Capacity Panel must be open by default because it is a mandatory field. 
The error message if the negociation has not been executed must explain where is the error and not just "invalid form".

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

After reflexions, the negociation test should be executed on the submit form. If the capability doesn't succeed, an error shoul be returned to the user.
